verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: pot roast] i like to serve my fork - tender pot roast with sauteed tarragon carrots and rosemary - roasted red potatoes this homey meal suits all tastes - and the aroma alone is satisfying —vera carroll medford massachusetts
